DEMO_422_MSG_010:
̃Can you hear me... ȁ... ?
It's me... Lucia.
DEMO_422_MSG_020:
̂What!? That's Lucia's voice! How is that possible...
Did Lucia turn into that thing!?
DEMO_422_MSG_100:
̃I'm sorry I couldn't continue on with you...
However, I feel you are ready for what lies ahead...
ā
DEMO_422_MSG_030:
̃I recorded this message in the event something
awful were to happen to me.
ā
DEMO_422_MSG_110:
̃I've always believed in you... moreso now than ever before. I feel as though there's only one more thing left for me to say.
ā
DEMO_422_MSG_040:
̃You need to pay very close attention, alright? There is a program installed in this Reactor, known as "Master Key".
ā
DEMO_422_MSG_120: ̃I believe in you, ȁ. You truly are our one and only hope.
DEMO_422_MSG_050: ̃It has the ability to unlock any door for you. That is exactly how I escaped from my prison cell.
DEMO_422_MSG_060:
̃You need to head to the top floor of the Bastille, and use this program to open the locked door there.
ā
DEMO_422_MSG_070:
̃Inside, you'll be able to re-enable the transfer device on this island. I found it while planning out my escape route.
ā
DEMO_422_MSG_080:
̃Once you re-enable that device, you'll be able to reach the land where the Fiery Volcano resides.
ā
DEMO_422_MSG_090:
̃Your old partner, Birdie, is on that island! You need to
reach the Fiery Volcano... and find Birdie at once!
